descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center]This mod adds 2 new spells to the game.[/center]
To get these spells you can either kill Nazeem and take the first spell and the key to Chillfurrow farm (its close to Whiterun) or just pickpocket him and take the spell and key.The second spell is inside Chillfurrow farm on a table to your right when you get inside.

The first spell simply lets you summon Nazeem to help you in fights and show him that you get to the cloud district often.
The second spell summons Nazeem with daedric armor and weapon because his usual weapons and clothes are useless in battle.Â [/size]
author: spinerex
